main.description: Adds an emoji reaction to a message. Requires authentication. It is idempotent, so multiple calls from the same user with the same emoji result in a single reaction.

errors.name: ReactionMessageDeleted
errors.description: Indicates that the message has been deleted and reactions can no longer be added/removed.

errors.name: ReactionLimitReached
errors.description: Indicates that the message has the maximum number of reactions allowed for a single user, and the requested reaction wasn't yet present. If it was already present, the request will not fail since it is idempotent.

errors.name: ReactionInvalidValue
errors.description: Indicates the value for the reaction is not acceptable. In general, this means it is not an emoji.
